1) The device identified is a Samsung dishwasher with the ID 6c645f61-0b82-235f-e476-8a6afc0e73dc. Its capabilities include execute, ocf, powerConsumptionReport, refresh, and remoteControlStatus. The main component is the dishwasher, which has a washing course set to express and no custom course candidates available.

2) The current state of the dishwasher is machine_state=stop. The dishwasher's operating state indicates that the completion time was 2023-10-02T15:07:12Z. There are no specific washing options like dryPlus or stormWash currently set.
